parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "contact_id": "{{ $json.contact_id }}",
  "title": "URGENT: Follow up with hot lead - {{ $json.contact_name }}",
  "description": "Contact became hot lead through {{ $json.triggering_activity.type }}. Score: {{ $json.new_behavioral_score }}/100. {{ $json.insights.join(' ') }}",
  "priority": "high",
  "due_date": "{{ new Date(Date.now() + 2*60*60*1000).toISOString() }}",
  "assigned_to": "sales_team",
  "task_type": "follow_up",
  "metadata": {
    "trigger": "behavioral_scoring",
    "score": {{ $json.new_behavioral_score }},
    "temperature": "{{ $json.new_temperature }}",
    "activity_type": "{{ $json.triggering_activity.type }}",
    "urgency_level": "high"
  }
}
